message.content:
cs.CL, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.IR, cs.NE. 

The paper proposes a model for generating informative and interesting responses for chatbots by incorporating topic information into the sequence-to-sequence framework. This involves using a joint attention mechanism and biased generation probability to leverage topic information in generation. The paper is likely to belong to the arXiv CS sub-categories of Computational Linguistics (cs.CL) as it deals with natural language processing and response generation, Artificial Intelligence (cs.AI) as it proposes a model for chatbots, Machine Learning (cs.LG) as it uses a sequence-to-sequence framework, Information Retrieval (cs.IR) as it involves topic modeling, and Neural and Evolutionary Computing (cs.NE) as it uses a neural network model.
